Add.Name: GetItemXml
Add.SerializedFunction: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Community.PageComments.Item.GetItemXml"><f:param name="PropertyNames"><f:paramelement value="Id" /><f:paramelement value="Name" /><f:paramelement value="Email" /><f:paramelement value="Title" /><f:paramelement value="Comment" /><f:paramelement value="Date" /><f:paramelement value="PageId" /></f:param><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Filter"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.GetInputParameter"><f:param name="InputParameterName" value="CommentFilter" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="OrderByField" value="Date" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="OrderAscending"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.GetInputParameter"><f:param name="InputParameterName" value="NewestAtBottom" /></f:function></f:param></f:function>

Add.Name: GetSettingsXml
Add.SerializedFunction: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Community.PageComments.Settings.GetSettingsXml"><f:param name="PropertyNames"><f:paramelement value="Comment" /><f:paramelement value="Id" /></f:param><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Filter"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Community.PageComments.Settings.ActivePageReferenceFilter"><f:param name="SitemapScope" value="Current" /></f:function></f:param></f:function>
